definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: In which, the teacher of the masses is the major source of staff's amateur educational teachers.
sentences.chinese: 其中，群众教师是河南职工业余教育教师的主要来源。

sentences.english: The second part mainly discusses the developing course of staffs amateur education .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，主要考察河南职工业余教育的内容和方式。

sentences.english: The six part is to make assessment of staff's amateur education.
sentences.chinese: 第六部分，对河南职工业余教育做出评估。

sentences.english: University TV has been regarded as the most effective method of part-time education.
sentences.chinese: 电视大学已经被认为是最有效的业余教育的方法。

pinyin: zhong1 deng3 zhuan1 ye4 jiao4 yu4

definition: partly released from productive labor/partly released from one's regular work
to transfer (from production to other duties)/to take leave (for study or other job)/to dispose of property/to transfer assets (to avoid liability)
college for people who attend after work
secondary normal school (secondary school that trains kindergarten and elementary school teachers)
